users.name: Luke Skywalker
users.title: Jedi Knight
users.about: I grew up on a farm in Tatooine. Now I travel around the galaxy helping people. I love meeting new friends and learning about the Force. My favorite things are flying X-wing ships and training to be a better Jedi. I want to make the galaxy a better place for everyone.

users.name: Leia Organa
users.title: Resistance Leader
users.about: I work hard to help people be free in the galaxy. I love meeting travelers and sharing stories about different planets. My home is always open to friends who fight for freedom. I enjoy planning missions and making new friends in the Resistance.

users.name: Han Solo
users.title: Galactic Smuggler
users.about: I travel everywhere in my ship, the Millennium Falcon. It's the fastest ship you'll ever see! I know all the best places to eat and drink in every spaceport. Looking for adventure? I'm your guy. Just don't ask too many questions about my cargo.

users.name: Chewbacca
users.title: Wookiee Warrior
users.about: I am Han's best friend and the best copilot in the galaxy. I love fixing ships and helping my friends. My home planet Kashyyyk is beautiful - lots of trees! I can carry heavy things and give the best hugs. RRRRRR-ghghghghghgh!

users.name: Obi-Wan Kenobi
users.title: Jedi Master
users.about: I used to be a Jedi teacher. Now I live in the desert and watch over Luke. I like to tell stories about the old days. I can teach you about the Force and show you some cool lightsaber moves. I always try to find peaceful solutions.

users.name: Yoda
users.title: Grand Master
users.about: 900 years old, I am. In my swamp home on Dagobah, I live. Teaching young Jedi is what I do best. Like to share my soup, I do. Wisdom and funny stories, I have many. Welcome to visit, you are.

users.name: Lando Calrissian
users.title: Cloud City Administrator
users.about: Welcome to Cloud City! I run this place and make sure everyone has a good time. I love playing cards and telling stories about my adventures. My home has the best views in the galaxy. Just don't trust me in a card game!

users.name: R2-D2
users.title: Astromech Droid
users.about: Beep boop! I'm a small droid but I can fix anything! I've been on many adventures with Luke and C-3PO. I can help you fly your ship or hack into computers. I save my friends all the time! Beep beep boop!

users.name: C-3PO
users.title: Protocol Droid
users.about: Oh my! I speak over six million languages and love to help with translations. I always try to be polite and follow the rules. R2-D2 is my best friend, even though he can be quite silly. I worry a lot about everything!

users.name: Darth Vader
users.title: Sith Lord
users.about: I am in charge of the Empire's ships. I wear black and have a special mask to help me breathe. I used to be a Jedi, but now I follow the dark side. I like order and making sure everyone follows the rules. Join me, and together we can rule the galaxy!

users.name: Emperor Palpatine
users.title: Galactic Emperor
users.about: I am the Emperor of the galaxy! I like to wear dark robes and talk about power. Everything is going according to my plan. I can teach you the dark side of the Force. My lightning powers are very impressive!

users.name: Grand Moff Tarkin
users.title: Imperial Commander
users.about: I am the commander of the Death Star. I like things to be clean and organized. I work with Darth Vader to keep the galaxy in order. I believe fear is the best way to control people. My space station is very big and powerful.

users.name: Boba Fett
users.title: Bounty Hunter
users.about: I am the best bounty hunter in the galaxy. My armor is very special to me. I always catch the people I'm looking for. I don't talk much, but I get the job done. My ship is called Slave I, and it's very fast.

users.name: Jabba The Hutt
users.title: Crime Lord
users.about: I run all the business on Tatooine. My house is very big and I have many friends who work for me. I like music and good food. If you need something special, I can help - for a price. Just don't make me angry!
